response.overview: Rural Oregon families have taken up the fight against aerial herbicide spraying by the forestry industry for more than 50 years â€” but has public safety around these substances since improved? Weaving historic archival footage with modern-day stories, the film is a powerful portrait of families grappling with the realities of herbicide exposure in their own backyards.
response.tagline: An industrial practice poisoning Oregon families
response.title: Free to Grow
